description: This Java class 'FreemarkerHelper' provides utility methods for processing FreeMarker templates into strings or files. It includes configuration setup and methods to process templates with data models.

classes.name: FreemarkerHelper
classes.description: Utility class for processing FreeMarker templates into strings or files with predefined configuration settings.

methods.name: processTemplateToString
methods.description: Processes a specified FreeMarker template with a data model and returns the result as a string.

methods.name: processTemplateToFile
methods.description: Processes a specified FreeMarker template with a data model and writes the output to a specified file.
